message: Let's split it evenly, no need to overthink it!
Take a slightly more modest share, let's move on!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect too much more!
You're not giving me enough, I'm the one making the next offer!
I'll give you more, but don't think you're getting the whole pie!
You're getting close to the edge, take it or leave it!
I'll give you more, but don't think I'm going to give it away!
You're running out of time, take the last decent offer!
I'll give you a small chance to reconsider, but don't think I'll go any further!
You're almost out of time, this is my final offer!
I'll give you a tiny chance to reconsider, but don't think I'll go any further!
This is my last chance, take it or we both lose!
